graphpack.remote
Interface IConnectionManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionManager
public interface IConnectionManager

this interface is a part of the communication SPI
its methods are responsible for making an service available remotely and for remotely connecting to other services
any implementation of this interface should transfer incoming requests to a corresponding Gateway

Author:
amitport

Method Summary
 IService connect(java.lang.String sourceService, java.lang.String sourceClient, java.lang.String targetService)
          connects to a remote service
 void export(java.lang.String serviceName, IService service)
          makes an service available remotely
the service can be made unavailable using unexport()
 void unexport()
          cancel the availability of the service that was exported using export(String, IService)
 

Method Detail

export

void export(java.lang.String serviceName,
            IService service)
makes an service available remotely
the service can be made unavailable using unexport()

Parameters:
serviceName - the name of the service
service - the service itself

unexport

void unexport()
cancel the availability of the service that was exported using export(String, IService)

connect

IService connect(java.lang.String sourceService,
                 java.lang.String sourceClient,
                 java.lang.String targetService)
connects to a remote service

Parameters:
sourceService - the service from which the connection is initiated
sourceClient - the client that initiates the connection
targetService - the name of the target service
Returns:
a proxy that represents the remote service. the proxy's method calls returns the same results as if the corresponding method was called on Gateway
